name: The Game of Nothing
description:
WISHLIST THE GAME!


The Game of Nothing is a game where you absolutely (kind of) nothing that also happens to be a fast-paced, multiplayer, fun-filled extravaganza!

We are launching the game into early access and a version is available for you to play sometime in February!

FEATURES

The Way to Play!
Play with up to 50 others in a server and compete to have the highest scores of nothing! In order to achieve the highest score, you walk to get your time up! You can also push your opponents into tiles that contain an empty, black void where they can fall to their death. You can then inherit their time and get that score up!

The Nothing Leaderboard!
Strive to be a top champion and be on the Nothing Leaderboard if you are in the Top 10. You can even see your rank in comparison to others in your game!

Customize your Character!
Choose the color you want to represent in the endless world of nothing!

Chat with Others and Play with Your Friends!
You can chat with others in your game that you may meet or invite your friends to your game to play with them!
